headline.main: Drug Developer Kadmon Skids Following Weak Demand for IPO
headline.print_headline: Drug Developer Kadmon Skids Following Weak Demand for IPO

docs.snippet: Shares of drug developer Kadmon Holdings tumbled Wednesday after its initial public offering priced far below the company's estimates....
docs.lead_paragraph: Shares of drug developer Kadmon Holdings tumbled Wednesday after its initial public offering priced far below the company's estimates.

headline.main: Homeland Security Employee Caught With Gun Pleads Not Guilty
headline.print_headline: Homeland Security Employee Caught With Gun Pleads Not Guilty

docs.snippet: A Department of Homeland Security employee has pleaded not guilty to charges stemming from entering his agency's Washington headquarters with a gun, knife, infrared camera, pepper spray and handcuffs....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Department of Homeland Security employee has pleaded not guilty to charges stemming from entering his agency's Washington headquarters with a gun, knife, infrared camera, pepper spray and handcuffs.

headline.main: CEO of Harvard's $37B Endowment Resigns for Personal Reasons

docs.snippet: The chief of Harvard University's $37 billion endowment is resigning after less than two years at the helm....
docs.lead_paragraph: The chief of Harvard University's $37 billion endowment is resigning after less than two years at the helm.

headline.main: Senior U.S. Lawmakers Want Information on DNC Hack Declassified
headline.print_headline: Senior U.S. Lawmakers Want Information on DNC Hack Declassified

docs.snippet: The top Democrats on the U.S. Senate and House of Representatives intelligence committees called on Wednesday for the White House to consider declassifying and releasing any intelligence community assessments of the hack into the Democratic Nation...
docs.lead_paragraph: The top Democrats on the U.S. Senate and House of Representatives intelligence committees called on Wednesday for the White House to consider declassifying and releasing any intelligence community assessments of the hack into the Democratic National Committee email system.

headline.main: Airbus Says Agrees Process to End European Export Credit Freeze
headline.print_headline: Airbus Says Agrees Process to End European Export Credit Freeze

docs.snippet: Airbus Group has agreed with European governments a process for regaining access to export credits, paving the way for unblocking a system halted this year over poor transparency in the use of intermediaries, it said on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Airbus Group has agreed with European governments a process for regaining access to export credits, paving the way for unblocking a system halted this year over poor transparency in the use of intermediaries, it said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Oops! Trump: Clinton's VP Pick Was Bad New Jersey Governor
headline.print_headline: Oops! Trump: Clinton's VP Pick Was Bad New Jersey Governor
